sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RHYME Rhime, Ryme, or Rime, in poetry, the ſimilar found or cadence and termination of two words which end two verſes, &c. Or rhyme is a ſimilitude of ſound between the laſt ſyllable or ſyllables of a verſe, ſucceeding either immediately or at a diſtance of two or three lines, See Poetry, n 0 177, &c.
